skins.selfIntroduction: I am Hatsushimo of the Hatsuharu-class destroyers. I fought in many battles alongside the 21st Destroyer Division. Although I didn't really sustain many injuries, in the end, you know how it went...
skins.acquisition: Oh my, what's with that scared expression? I won't bite~ I am Hatsushimo of the Hatsuharu class. I hope we can get along, ahaha~
skins.login: Did you only just realize that you still have work to do?
skins.details: Excellent. You seem to have remembered our appointment~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Are you more concerned with your popularity among the girls than with your actual work?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Yukikaze? I must admit, she is the luckier one...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Huh? Right now... could you not space out while we still have work to do?
skins.secretaryTouch: You want to touch my tail? Well, I can't promise you what happens next~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ehehe... Commander, such a brave soul...

skins.shipDescription: Hatsushimo's retrofitting is complete. You don't think I look all that different? Oh, Commander, you're still as simple as ever~ I've changed in tons of ways beyond what's just on the surface. Heheheh~
skins.acquisition: Hatsushimo's retrofitting is complete. You don't think I look all that different? Oh, Commander, you're still as simple as ever~ I've changed in tons of ways beyond what's just on the surface. Heheheh~
skins.details: Being able to come to this port, and now even receiving a retrofit... Looks like my luck's not too bad, hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hatsuharu doesn't seem to be as scared of strangers anymore. Heh, looks like you've been taking good care of her~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hmm, what are you staring at? Naughty Commander~
skins.secretaryIdle3: *staaaare*... Oh, I'm just carrying out my secretary duties of observing you, Commander~ Don't let your mind wander so easily~
skins.secretaryTouch: Interested in my tail? Well, I guess I'll let you touch it. You'd better be grateful~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Do you want to experience for yourself... the less visible parts of me that have changed? Commander~?

skins.shipDescription: Cheers, Commander~ C'mere, you've got to enjoy the party too! If you're thinking of doing something tactless like running off to go back to work, people are going to get upset with you~
skins.acquisition: Cheers, Commander~ C'mere, you've got to enjoy the party too! If you're thinking of doing something tactless like running off to go back to work, people are going to get upset with you~
skins.details: Commander, please be mindful of the girls who tend to get lonely easily. Like Kasumi, for example... Hmm? She's perfectly fine? ...Was I misunderstanding something?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I see, I see. So this is one of Ikazuchi's "creative dishes!" ...I have no freakin' clue what this is! Hey, Salt Lake City, how about you?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I wonder what that stuff is that the Northern Parliament girls are always drinking... Feels like something I shouldn't look too deeply into.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Russian Roulette with candy? Hmm, count me in. I don't lose at this kind of stuff.
skins.secretaryTouch: Though I don't quite stack up compared to Wakaba and Naganami, I've got plenty of confidence when it comes to the size~ of my tail, of course. Heehee~
